entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle near midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
